description: Final Playwright Regression Suite for I5.T8
purpose: Consolidated regression testing for display, PrepChef, Admin CRM, notifications, feature flags, and undo flows under production-like data

specs.coverage: Task management workflows, claiming, completion, realtime updates, accessibility
Task combination suggestions, approval workflows, conflict resolution, undo expiration
Drag-and-drop assignment, event filtering, staff presence, priority indicators, accessibility
Realtime outages, offline modes, media backlogs, display resilience, conflict resolution

notes: Includes chaos simulation using RealtimeChaosHelper for realtime outages, offline modes, and conflict scenarios. Verifies accessibility compliance, fallback mechanisms, user messaging, and data integrity. All tests use production-like data volumes and realistic user scenarios.

acceptance_criteria.functional: All critical user journeys working correctly
acceptance_criteria.resilience: Fallback mechanisms working for all failure scenarios
acceptance_criteria.security: RBAC enforcement and audit logging verified
